question: Refer to the figure <image 1>, which term refers to adventure stories with a search motif?
description:
The image is a movie poster for "The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring." The title is prominently displayed at the top in large, golden letters. Below the title, there is an illustration featuring several characters from the film. In the foreground, a young man with long hair, dressed in green and brown attire, stands out. He appears to be the central character. Surrounding him are other characters, including a man with a beard holding a sword, a woman with long dark hair, and others who seem to be part of a group or fellowship. 

In the background, there is a scene depicting a group of people riding horses across a landscape, suggesting a journey or quest. The overall tone of the poster conveys a sense of adventure and epic scale. The bottom of the poster includes text indicating that the film was nominated for Academy Awards in categories such as Best Picture and Best Director. The DVD logo is also present, indicating that this is a DVD cover.

The image clearly depicts elements of a story involving a group of characters embarking on a significant journey, which aligns with the concept of a quest.
